name: Seiko Flight Master Quartz Chronograph Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Bi-directional rotating black PVD bezel. Black dial with luminous hands and dot hour markers. Minute markers. Tachymeter markings. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 seconds, 60 minutes and 12 hours (alarm). Quartz movement. Scratch resistant Hardlex crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 42 mm. Case thickness: 13 mm. Round case shape. Push button deployment clasp. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet. Functions: alarm, tachymeter, second, chronograph, date, hour, minute. Additional Info: alarm; fuel consumption calculations; flight climb calculations; chronograph; tachymeter; date displays at 3 o'clock position. Sport watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Item Variations: SNA411, SNA411-1, SNA411-P1, SNA411P1, Seiko-SNA411, Seiko-SNA411-1. Seiko Flight Chronograph Steel Black Dial Men's Watch SNA411.

name: Tissot PRS 516 Automatic Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Bi-directional rotating black PVD bezel. Black dial with luminous hands and dot hour markers. Minute markers. Tachymeter markings. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 seconds, 60 minutes and 12 hours (alarm). Quartz movement. Scratch resistant Hardlex crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 42 mm. Case thickness: 13 mm. Round case shape. Push button deployment clasp. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet. Functions: alarm, tachymeter, second, chronograph, date, hour, minute. Additional Info: alarm; fuel consumption calculations; flight climb calculations; chronograph; tachymeter; date displays at 3 o'clock position. Sport watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Item Variations: SNA411, SNA411-1, SNA411-P1, SNA411P1, Seiko-SNA411, Seiko-SNA411-1. Seiko Flight Chronograph Steel Black Dial Men's Watch SNA411.

name: Longines HydroConquest Automatic Watch
description: Description Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Uni-directional rotating stainless steel bezel with a black ring. Black dial with luminous silver-tone hands and index hour markers. Arabic numerals mark the 6, 9 and 12 o'clock positions. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Longines calibre L619/888 automatic movement, based upon ETA 2892, containing 21 Jewels, bitting at 25200 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 64 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 41 mm. Case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 21 mm. Fold over clasp with a safety release. Water resistant at 300 meters / 1000 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second. Hydroconquest Series. Dive watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Longines HydroConquest 41mm Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch L3.742.4.56.6.

name: Hamilton Khaki Chronograph Automatic
description: Stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Silver dial with blue spade-shaped hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers. Arabic numeral minute markers (at 5 minute intervals) around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Chronograph - two sub-dials displaying: 12 hour and 30 minute. Hamilton calibre H-21 Automatic movement, based upon ETA 7750, containing 25 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 60 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Transparent case back. Round case shape. Case size: 44 mm. Case thickness: 10 mm. Band width: 22 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: chronograph, date, hour, minute, second. Khaki Series. Dress watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Hamilton Khaki Navy Pioneer Chronograph Automatic Men's Watch H77706553.

name: Longines Master Collection Moonphase Watch
description: Silver-tone stainless steel case with a dark brown alligator leather strap. Fixed silver-tone stainless steel bezel. Silver textured dial with blue leaf-style shape hands and black Arabic numerals hour markers. Date scale around the outer rim. Minute markers around the inner bezel. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and month dispyed at the 12 o'clock position. Three sub-dials displaying: dual 24 hour/60 second, 30 minute and 12 hour/moon phase. Longines Calibre L678 Automatic movement, based upon Valjoux 7751, containing 25 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 48 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Skeleton case back. Round case shape, case size: 40 mm, case thickness: 14 mm. Band width: 19 mm, band length: 8 inches. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: chronograph, month, date, day, moonphase, hours, minutes, second, 24 hours. Master Collection Complete Calendar Series. Dress watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Item Variations: L2 673 4 78 3, L2-673-4-78-3, L2/673/4/78/3, L26734783. Longines Master Collection Moonphase Men's Watch L2.673.4.78.3.

name: Tudor Black Bay Automatic GMT Pepsi Bezel Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Bi-directional rotating coin edge stainless steel bezel with a red and blue aluminium (Pepsi) top ring showing 24 hour markers. Black dial with luminous silver-tone snowflake hands and dot hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Tudor calibre MT5652 automatic movement, containing 26 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 70 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 41 mm. Band width: 22 mm. Fold over clasp. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet. Functions: GMT, second time zone, hour, minute, second, date. Black Bay Series. Luxury watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Tudor Black Bay Automatic Black Dial Men's GMT Pepsi Bezel Watch 79830RB-0001.

name: Omega Speedmaster Chronograph Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Fixed stainless steel bezel with a black aluminium top ring showing tachymeter markings. Black dial with rhodium-plated hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 second, 30 minute and 12 hour. Omega calibre 3330 automatic movement, based upon ETA Valjoux 7753, containing 31 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 52 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Round case shape, case size: 38 mm, case thickness: 13.2 mm. Band width: 18 mm. Fold over clasp with a push button release. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: chronograph, tachymeter, hour, minute, second. Speedmaster Series. Luxury watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Omega Speedmaster Chronograph Automatic Black Dial Men's Watch 324.30.38.50.01.001.

description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Bi-directional rotating black PVD bezel. Black dial with luminous hands and dot hour markers. Minute markers. Tachymeter markings. name: Raymond Weil Maestro Automatic Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a black leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Silver white dial with blue Breguet-style shape hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Raymond Weil calibre RW 4530 automatic movement, containing 26 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 38 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Skeleton case back. Round case shape. Case size: 39.5 mm. Case thickness: 9.5 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Band length: 7.75 inches. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second. Maestro Series. Dress watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Item Variations: 2837 STC 00659, 2837.STC.00659, 2837STC00659. Raymond Weil Maestro Automatic Silver Dial Men's Watch 2837-STC-00659.

name: Citizen Eco Drive Blue Angel Chronograph Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Fixed blue ion-plated bezel. Blue dial with luminous hands and index hour markers. Minute markers. World time cities. Navigation calculator markings around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Three sub-dials displaying: 60 second, 24 hour and dual 1/100th of a second/day of the week. Eco-Drive H800 Atomic Timekeeping Radio Controlled eco-drive movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 43 mm. Case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 22 mm. Band length: 8.5 inches. Fold over clasp with a double push button release. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet. Functions: chronograph, date, hour, minute, second, perpetual calendar, world time. Blue Angels Series. Sport watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Item Variations: AT8020 54L, AT8020.54L, AT802054L. Citizen Eco Drive Blue Angels Chronograph Men's Watch AT8020-54L.

name: Cartier Panthere de Cartier 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch
description: 18kt pink gold case with a 18kt pink gold bracelet. Fixed 18kt pink gold bezel. Silver dial with blued-steel sword-shaped hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around an inner ring. Dial Type: Analog. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown set with a synthetic blue spinel cabochon. Solid case back. Square case shape. Case dimensions: 27 mm x 37 mm. Case thickness: 6 mm. Hidden fold over clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute. Panthere De Cartier Series. Luxury watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Cartier Panthere de Cartier Silver Dial 18kt Pink Gold Ladies Watch WGPN0007.

name: Tissot T-Classic Automatic Ladies Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a two-tone (silver and gold PVD) stainless steel bracelet. Fixed two-tone (silver and gold PVD) bezel. White dial with gold-tone hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. ETA caliber 902.101 quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Case size: 30 mm. Case thickness: 6.15 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 20 mm. Jewelry clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Tissot T-Classic Everytime White Dial Ladies Watch T109.210.22.031.00.

name: Hamilton Automatic Shield Shaped Ladies Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Silver (skeleton center) dial with silver-tone dauphine-style hands and index hour markers. Minute markers. Dial Type: Analog. Hamilton calibre H-10 automatic movement, based upon ETA C07.111, containing 25 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 80 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Exhibition case back. Shield case shape. Case dimensions: 38 mm x 33 mm. Case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Band length: 8 inches. Deployment clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hours, minutes, seconds. Dress watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Hamilton American Ventura Automatic Shield Shaped Watch H24515551.

name: Longines Dolce Vita Silver Dial Ladies Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Silver dial with blue hands and Roman numeral hour markers. Minute markers around an inner ring. Dial Type: Analog. Seconds sub-dial above the 6 o'clock position. Longines calibre L178 quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Case dimensions: 32 mm x 20.5 mm. Rectangle case shape. Band width: 15 mm. Triple fold over clasp. Water resistant at 30 meters / 100 feet. Functions: hour, minute, small second. Dress watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Longines Dolce Vita Silver Dial Stainless Steel Ladies Watch L52554716.

name: Rolex Lady Datejust Violet Stripe Ladies Watch
description: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel Rolex jubilee bracelet with 18kt yellow gold center links. Fixed 18kt yellow gold bezel set with diamonds. Violet stripe motif dial with yellow gold-tone hands and diamond hour markers. Dial Type: Analog. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Rolex calibre 2236 automatic movement, based upon Rolex 2235, containing 31 Jewels, bitting at 28800 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 55 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Round case shape. Case size: 28 mm. Concealed crown clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second, chronometer. Lady Datejust Series. Luxury watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Item Variations: 279383-63343. Rolex Lady Datejust Violet Stripe Diamond Dial Automatic Ladies Watch 279383VDJ.
